website_summaries.verdict: Durable, easy-to-use camera glasses that don’t skimp on quality despite costing less than much of the competition.
pros: Record videos, audio, and photos with the press of a button
Frames and lenses are water- and impact-resistant, making them perfect for an active lifestyle
32 gigabyte memory for up to 60 minutes of recording
cons: Photo and video quality aren't as good in low-light situations
Glasses don’t allow for the addition of an SD card

customer_reviews.title: High Definition Image and sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses fit nice and snug will not fall off. Comes with a neck strap, case a, USB wire and charger. Has a built in 32GB memory chip. I asked for support to set the date and messaged the seller via Amazon message and they got back to me and gave me step by step instructions. Great customer service. Video image is high quality as is the sound. Will try and upload a video after my next trip... :) Edit: Video Uploaded but for some reason Amazon does not play pack in HD. If you YouTube search "OhO sunshine Waterproof Video Sunglasses Disney World" you will see this video in the High Def 1080P that it records it as.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: No image stabilization
customer_reviews.text: I've had the oho shades for 2 days now and I do like them But there is NO IMAGE STABILIZATION at all. I've played back multiple video clips and no matter how steady I was in the video any slight movement had the jello effect. You can not do any kind of natural movement. The slightest movement in the video looks like you're on a rollercoaster. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE FIX THIS ISSUE
customer_reviews.author: STEPHON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent video sunglasses for daily use, and for capturing and recording special occassions.
customer_reviews.text: The OHO waterproof video sunglasses are exactly as described. I am very pleased with their aesthetics and comfy fit alone. Operating the camera for video and still images is very easy. It only took a few brief tests to learn the field of vision, audio pick up, and viewing and downloading files. These glasses will definitely enhance my ability to record my near term short trips and share them with family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: DanC

customer_reviews.title: Bought FOUR pairs!
customer_reviews.text: These were the best purchase for our family vacation! All the adults were able to participate in water sports and record their adventures to later play back for the rest of the family. While, as the doting grandmother, I was able to spend the day with my two grandchildren and record their daily adventures with me. I got the cutest unsuspecting video of my grandson grabbing my cheeks and going in for a kiss while he screamed, "LOVE YOU!" I am very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: great sunglasses and the video quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love these and bought a pair for my friend. The video is clear color and steady...much easier and descret way to video what ever you need to. Sun and clear lenses included so you dont have to worry about filming in any situation,. Audio is excellent and picks up sounds as well as you voice at a whisper. Also excellent as a dash cam on your face! look good on most faces...great grip so easy to use while active. Uploads are easy to your computer and film time is 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Maxxfactor

customer_reviews.title: fast mailing and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get the date on my glasses and I use them for protection against someone I have a restraining order on and need the date on them
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dale

customer_reviews.title: It takes great videos and sound is also good
customer_reviews.text: It takes great videos and sound is also good. I realized that the lens bottom part of the lens is not fitted properly into the frame. I was however surprised that the manual said I should not use it for driving and swimming which is quite different from the description on Amazon that lured me into buying it. However it is still a great piece of glass.
customer_reviews.author: Loveland Agbo

customer_reviews.title: Glasses record well and in good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Took these glasses for their first trip on a carnival cruise. They performed well. Heads up on the how to use..when you turn them on (long press on the button)they are recording video. Tap the button to take pictures. Videos are good. SOME pictures get an odd color offset thing where red is ofset from where it should be but I think that's from taking pictures and moving. Here's a link to a video I took with the glasses while I went down a waterslide. **Edit** I just reviewed this video and I have to say it was clear when I uploaded it. I think it got corrupted on upload.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great value couple things that need to be changed car motorcycle riders
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work great picture was good sound was way too much wind noise on a motorcycle but that's to be expected what I don't understand is why they put the picture taking button in the right side of the glasses where you have to hold the throttle they should be on the left side Very difficult to take pictures while you're riding with the button on the right side other than that great value
customer_reviews.author: Rick s

customer_reviews.title: The sunglasses fits perfectly and the features are amazing. Hand-free Technology is truly awesome
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses fits perfectly and the features are amazing. Hand-free Technology is truly awesome. No longer have to hold a camera while wearing the glasses with tons of storage to film nor take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Metrosonic

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Video Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof Video Sunglasses. bought these while on vacation to record places that were visited. Quality of the pictures was great. The only problem I had was figuring out how much of what you could see was actually getting recorded. Made mistake while recording and lost the bottom of some of the scenes because even though I could see that part of the picture it was to low for the camera. I may try putting some type of covering below what is getting recorded.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S. Jakubecz

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Video Quality, I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I received these today. I've not had that much time to play with them, but I did go riding around earlier and recorded some video in the process. The quality of the video was definitely acceptable. However, I can tell I need to train my head movement to be less abrupt. Image stabilization will have to be done in post-editing/processing. I do need to do more testing inside buildings but at this point, for the price, it seems well-worth it. UPDATE 10/14/19: Search YouTube for "Ae_VBTnbM5Q" to see my video review of these glasses. Still use them frequently! I would buy them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: great image quality
customer_reviews.text: i'm impressed with the googles simply awesome sound quality impressive too sharp image even when recorded from car
customer_reviews.author: mateusz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These glasses arrived just before our last vacation. They fit a little wide but the picture quality is great! Will definitely recommend the to anyone interested in video sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Cor

customer_reviews.title: Great video sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good video quality, great polarized lenses. I question the waterproofing of the USB port and sd ports.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to be able to record video without having to carry a hand-held device. I went to Cancun, recorded playing volleyball at the pool. When I came home, I tried to download the video but it did not work at all. It looks like the product was not water-prove after all. Used once, turned off when done, tried to download the video but, I was never able to download it. It was dead, it wouldn't charge. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Nice video option
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t really used them yet but so far so good in testing
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Spence

customer_reviews.title: The Most Important! Video Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only the center area is in focus. It gets softer towards the edges. If you are close to someone, their face will be a little narrower. Not at all happy with this product. Bought The RINCÓN Video Glasses and I am much more impressed. Also bought the E7 Gogloo’s and find those to be the slighter better of the 2. But high ratings on both of those. The only thing I did like more on the first pair was the design and lens color. Which is why I bought those in the first place. Only wish there were different color lenses to buy for the Rincons and Gogloo E7.
customer_reviews.author: MannyCAM 2001

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I like everything about these glasses except I did not expect the orange tinted while looking through them. I gave 4 stars on water resistance and battery life only because I have not been able to test those 2 areas out.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Schleeter

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it! Audio broke down after less than 2-months!
customer_reviews.text: So, when I got it - it seemingly was a good product. Compared to today's action cameras and smartphones, the video isn't that good; but it was usable. I was happy. But then, until a few weeks back, audio has become horrible! Checking out the recording, I hear the volume go UP and DOWN! Even inside the house with no wind - audio is terrible. I don't know what happened. I may need to reach out to Amazon here.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The functions are easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best spy glasses out. BUT they only worked for almost two weeks. Then stopped. I love these while they were working. I wish they would come with warranty. The quality and sound isn’t bad at all especially for the price. Again, I would suggest the glasses out of any online. But they don’t last long. I’m disappointed. I use these for work and out in the public. I want my money back or to get these working. The recording red light and a blue light is on at the same time. Then it shuts off. Does not record.
customer_reviews.author: KeepIt1Hunnid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality photos and video in all light situations
customer_reviews.text: Good quality photos and video in all light situations, but battery doesn't last and sometimes it doesn't shut off when you press and hold the button. there should also be two buttons. One for on/off/video start and another for photos.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schwartzberg

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love these glasses but..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these for sailing, SUP, etc without wearing my clunky gopro on my head. The photos were OK.. Videos choppy. Good enough for otherwise hard shots to get. Battery OK, looks ok. controls OK. The problem was there is a fragile rubber cover of the mUSB slot that broke off after one use. No longer waterproof ..no longer useful.
customer_reviews.author: chris fleck

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses 🕶️
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses! Honestly, i use them mostly as sunglasses. UV protection, polarized lenses, wrap around design, durable construction. They're very comfortable to my eyes and on my face. I've only used the camera feature a few times, so i can't give a detailed review about it. I've used it indoors and the images were dark and not very detailed. But that's the way it is with most cameras anyway. Outdoor shots, where there's more light, might yield better quality shots. Overall I'm pretty happy when these camera sunglasses. They're waterproof, have a build in HD camera, and protect my eyes from the sun. I'd definitely buy these again if i want to get a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Roge213

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they work within refund period!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in March 2019 and never took out of box until yesterday. The glasses appeared to work as advertised until I hooked up to computer to retrieve video. After following the instructions to the letter, there was/is no connection between glasses and computer... in other words, no way to access or retrieve video or photos. So, unfortunately, I cannot get a replacement or refund due to ordering over a year ago and now I am stuck with nothing more than another pair of sunglasses with blinking lights.
customer_reviews.author: John C Greer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device. I use it with kids so they don't know I'm recording them. Or at least they dont know when. It is TRULY WATERPROOF. On the beach. In the rain. Kayaking. Or just sweating watching baseball. I do notice when running for 20 mins the nose piece does get hot. Probably more due to the blinki light. It also allows me to catch wonderful pictures at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working :(  Second pair I have gotten on amazon,
customer_reviews.text: second brand and both have lasted less than a year. I contacted the seller and they were quick to send me a replacement. I am adjusting the rating from 1 to 4. I will adjust it again as soon as I see if it holds up. Thanks for the quick response
customer_reviews.author: Royal Ottmar

customer_reviews.title: I don't notice any image stabilization
customer_reviews.text: The product description says, "The Glasses Feature Advanced Image Stabilization which Enables You to Record Action Shots with Nice Smooth Video." I don't notice any image stabilization at all. These might be fine if you're sitting or standing still, but not if you plan on moving.
customer_reviews.author: Just Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great video glasses but with a question attached
customer_reviews.text: Its a sweet video platform. Nice video and pictures. It's easy to use. I recommenned to practice turning on...taking a picture...and turning off while your looking at the led's on the inside of frame so you understand how it works. Really easy. The reason I didn't give it a 5 is that the charger did not come with it and it was supposed to and the date given to each video/picture file was set as 02/15/2015 even tho I bought them in june of 2020. I'm not sure now if these were a return and repackaged? I was going to send them back but they seem to be working ok
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: maybe i am dumb
customer_reviews.text: the instructions are pretty bad. i have fully charge and decided to take a video. the red light came on ok but when i tried to view, my computer does not see the device only a file called backup that contains instructions for changing the date. btw i have no idea how to do this based on those instructions. at this point i am very frustrated and about to return the product. btw i run windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Edward Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not actually waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about 6 months ago and they worked fine until I took these "waterproof" sunglasses into a pool for the first time last week. They gave a long buzz shortly after the pool and have been dead ever since. I also not able to recover any of the videos I took of vacation from the glasses. It's basically impossible to find any contact information or warranty information from this company - they don't even appear to have a website. Be wary of the waterproof claim. Only giving this two stars because when they worked they were great, but this is too expensive of an item to die after 6 months (and taking all your videos with it).
customer_reviews.author: P. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Did not live up to claims
customer_reviews.text: The item only recorded 20 minutes on a full charge. Picture looks somewhat "fried". Someone questioned the waterproofing... I can answer that. This item is about as waterproof as a wedding cake. I jumped into a pool wearing this item. It was submerged for about two seconds with my head about 12 below the surface. The camera stopped functioning and the item storage was inaccessible for two days. Nice idea, poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles West

customer_reviews.title: Easy, clear and great stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son these glasses for his business life and his personal life with my grandsons. The video is actually better than my i-phone. All you do is press the sides and you are filming. Check your local state for recording laws, in Nevada only one party needs to be aware. I'm going to buy more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Coleman

customer_reviews.title: The audio sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is as promised. Of course, if you properly adjust the settings on the INIT file. However, no matter what image quality I set it to or the FPS (Frames Per Second), the audio sounds like it's constantly in and out. I'll still be able to use this for the purpose I plan to, however, I'm going to have to use a separate device to record the audio and that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Stivaro

customer_reviews.title: The Best Video Glasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great video capture with perfect sound. Light weight, easy to operate via clearly written instruction manual. Interchangeable lens with no problems. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Fry

customer_reviews.title: Just the lens
customer_reviews.text: For a hundred dollar product the lens pop off and scratch easily but the video is outstanding audio is ok if your have a distance from a concert stage. Other then that its pretty good product, just needs a little more improvement
customer_reviews.author: cesar garcia

customer_reviews.title: They work well with Anrdoid and Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to film video and pics. Best to keep head steady and swivel head slowly for best picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheating
customer_reviews.text: Works very bad and I returned. As a prime member i have the right to return for free but the charge d me $30 illegal. Just don't buy anything from this website anymore.
customer_reviews.author: LBC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glasses perfect for anyone in any walk of life.
customer_reviews.text: The Pictures and video were absolutely amazing it was awesome in the water as well everything was crystal clear and the images or pictures were very good quality and very Crisp. Also after a glass of stopped working due to a malfunction with in the glass is the company Dhl’d me a brand new pair with extra lens right away. These glasses are perfect for anyone, whether you are into extreme sports, you are going to a special event, or if you are just a traveler like me and my wife, or if you just find yourself in a situation you wish you could have recorded, these are the perfect ones for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Quartaraco

customer_reviews.title: Make the best gift and are high quality
customer_reviews.text: Coolest glasses Not too bulky so you look normal wearing them The style is your men's typical sport style My dad loves these Records himself riding his quad in the desert and shooting his guns Very good image stabilization and sound and great picture quality Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Video was not good...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the product and got it in a timely manner. It came with usb cord, a power charger, lense wipe, interchangeable clear lense, a strap for neck, instructions, and carrying case. I got the product today. I fully charged the product and tried it out. The picture I took was clear. The quality of the video was okay. It did not keep up with the movement. In the video, I could tell every time I moved my head. I thought that the video would of been better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: neddys

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Products I've Bought
customer_reviews.text: As a security guard, I wanted something that I could wear on sunny days when I interact with the public. This product shipped quickly, was easy to set up, and worked without issue. The picture quality is extremely worth the price alone. They are unnoticeable, and comfortable to wear. Without a doubt, I'd recommend these for anybody in a law enforcement or security position who wants to document interactions for liability purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Video Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the purchase! Great video quality and good battery life! The customer support is also very good and they are very fast in response. The only minor complaint I have is that I feel the glass is little heavier after wearing them for more than 3 hours...
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Clear Video and Audio!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this video sunglasses. Watch the video for detailed description and field test. I will be using these sunglasses for my metal detecting adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Great hidden camera
customer_reviews.text: 1080 videos it’s ok for hands free video you like to record when u driving or biking no ones knows you filming them
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Product has discounts wont give
customer_reviews.text: The battery life sucked&I never got my50%for my product review
customer_reviews.author: AMB-PhD

customer_reviews.title: We all love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My son said that he loves the glasses so much. He wants to show it on next time activists of Cub Scout. I asked him how about give the glasses a good review. He said “ Sure, why not?!” : )
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Sun

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried cheaper made ones and those suck ballz! These are made really great and come in a nice packaging and a cloth to clean your lenses. They're very simple to use. They are awesome! I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good video. Short battery.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Battery life is too short (about 45min after 1yr of use). Not a solution for filming your kids sporting events in their entirety. Video quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Haden S.

customer_reviews.title: Glasses record well and in good quality
customer_reviews.text: This pair of glasses is good looking, easy to set up and the Vedio is stable and clear. Also the sound quality is ok. The only issue is it is a little bit tight for me. It will be perfect if it is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Guifeng

customer_reviews.title: If computer does not recognize this anymore, swap out USB cable
customer_reviews.text: After a couple weeks my Mac quit recognizing this product when I plugged it in. I found a way to fix this problem by changing out the USB cable for a new one. Other than that, the glasses are working great!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: Update - OHO contacted me and asked to send me a new set of sunglasses, make sure to check your amazon messages. The new set showed up quickly and seem to work so far. Original - My sunglasses worked great for a month, now they will not hold a charge and my return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bedoun

customer_reviews.title: Soccer game recorder
customer_reviews.text: I use these glasses to record my daughters Soccer games. Great storage, video quality is good too. Of course they can’t zoom in but other than that awesome
customer_reviews.author: deebojr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: The out performed my expectation. I was expecting a okay quality glass with very basic video quality. However, the product came in with good shipping protection and the finish on product was excellent. The glasses is durable and the video quality is very high. I highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Yuming

customer_reviews.title: The Best Camera Glasses Made!
customer_reviews.text: I went through several brands of these in an attempt to find ones that truly work. These are go-pro quality video, audio, and image stabilization. If you want camera glasses that actually perform, these are #1. Try the cheaper ones, but you'll end up with these!
customer_reviews.author: terrible

customer_reviews.title: Not really waterproof?
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great for video, but I took them in the water once, and now they no longer record sound.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great value great quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tested at night but it’s excellent for day time recording
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love those glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of the videos. Wish the battery will last longer
customer_reviews.author: Dory Panch

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The product feels solid, works well, and is well priced. My uses will be kayaking, ATV and motor cycle plus jet ski; etc. so the included head band and water resistance fit my needs. The video and picture quality is good. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied buyer

customer_reviews.title: Factory Reply , good service .
customer_reviews.text: Update . I got reply from Factory . This will be adjusted. Good reply . I will get soon and update review.
customer_reviews.author: vegasman

customer_reviews.title: Works best in good light.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me these glasses and they take surprisingly good videos and pictures. These glasses will make a nice addition to our cruise equipment🚢
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great video sunglasses 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Mom for Mother's Day, and she loves them. This product makes a great gift. Mom loves that they are easy to use and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't find my videos or photos
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I received my glasses, I did all the steps but when I look for the videos in the computer I can't find any. I need your help. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Felipe S.

customer_reviews.title: I use them everyday
customer_reviews.text: I use these glasses everyday. You can capture the special moments in life like conversations with your family in the car , walking your child to school and great for Disney World rides. I highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good video 4 this kinda money
customer_reviews.text: The yellow tinge in the image appears to be present in both cameras I tried. Additionally the center of the video is blurry while the edges are way sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Claye

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Wore these glasses once, they worked fine until they got wet...have not worked since...waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Moore

customer_reviews.title: best one out there
customer_reviews.text: the only thing wrong is that is shakes a lot- other than that it is awesome- built to last and has great video footage.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor usage. Indoor not do much if there aren't much light around.
customer_reviews.text: Ok video quality, not over average. For picture, any movement will make picture blurry. Stay Steady to capture photo.
customer_reviews.author: RICKY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Way better video quality and ease of use than Gopro Hero 6!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, but not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The camera was easy to use and download videos, but the video quality was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Delaney

customer_reviews.title: really works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product stay on your head while running and stylish. Just cant take a pic you have to have the video running then snap
customer_reviews.author: thomas rubel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Worn once. Heavy on your ears; wanted for biking but too uncomfortable. Paperweight now.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J. Norat

customer_reviews.title: Poor video Quality for Average price
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely no High end video, the only time i Can get good Video is if the lighting is just right, and that is hard to tell since you cant see the video as its being shot so just just have to cross your fingers every time you hit record. Also there is not OHO branding anywhere on the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the quick fix!
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong item at first and was very disappointed but just got what I ordered! Only took a few days to get the actual order after the mistake. Very pleased to get the glasses. Thank you and I look forward to using the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kayak King

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, nasty and defective.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't charge, doesn't get recognized by Mac OSX. Poor quality. Not worth $170. Returned as garbage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Great but dont last even a month
customer_reviews.text: Didnt last a month so disappointed in really liked there glasses o bought them for bike riding and walks etc.. now no computer can detect it and my movies and pictures from vacation are lost in it I cant get them out any suggestions....
customer_reviews.author: R Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: These glasses worked for about 3 weeks. They stopped comunicating with pc. So now I can’t get my videos or pictures. Just had amazon send me another pair. If it happens again I recommend not buying these glasses you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Deleted the instructions and ability to change date and time!
customer_reviews.text: After saving the video date, time and recording size into the root file the original files with the instructions disappeared altogether! I now have no way to format, change video size or date and time stamp! I returned the first pair and with the second pair added files so the original wouldn't get erased but still after following the instructions all the files and the instructions were deleted yet again. Had to return both and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They didn't work for me. PC-only?
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't able to get these to work for me. I am a Mac user, so maybe that has something to do with it. That is not stated in the product description. I'm starting to doubt the reviews for this product. Now it's too late to return, I feel silly for buying them and not returning immediately. I got a GoPro now, which works well. But these would have been fun if they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Dobelis

customer_reviews.title: That it doesn't function properly
customer_reviews.text: Used 1 day. Filled memory card. Removed all videos and pictures. Card still shows full, won't let me use anymore. Won't let me add a new .ini file to reformate. Reset button does nothing..... Now just a expensive paperweight 😔
customer_reviews.author: AntacidWarrior

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: the glasses worked once and after downloading the pictures, they wouldn't record again, even after fully charging them and resetting them AND the "paperclip" reset. Give me a break! Little to no help from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Great Quality,descreet,Good battery
customer_reviews.text: These Glasses are Great and perfect especially for the cost... The Glasses record in 1080p and yes the recording quality is great and even the 30fps is good. The glasses arent noticed as recording glasses around other people either and they blend in as normal looking sunglasses. Plus these come with 1 extra clear lenses even if you buy the dark shade ones. Worth the buy get it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are awesome & easy to use. I love the fact that you can take a picture while videoing what you filming. They are lightweight and comfortable to wear, I would totally recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: OhO sunshine Waterproof Video Audio Sunglasses,Built-in Memory with Ultra 1080P Full HD Video Recording Camera and Polarized UV400 Protection Safety Lenses,Unisex Sport Design
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF FEATURE: OHO Video Recording Camera Sunglasses is the World First IP66 Level Water Protection Sunglasses,Available for all Kinds Water Sports Including Surfing, Water Moto Bike or Raining Weather etc.

ULTRA HD 1080P VIDEO RECORDING: Amazing 1080P Ultra Full HD Resolution Video with Audio, and Crisp Photo, Very Comfortable to Wear and Widely Used When Cycling, Hunting, Fishing, Police, Traveling and Living, Perfect for Fast Action Shots and Recording

IMPACT RESISTANT LENSES AND FRAME: US Safety Lens Standard ANSI/ISEA Z87.1-2015 Impact Resistant for Eye and Face Protection, 100% UV400 Protection Polarized Lens with FDA Drop Bell Lens for all Kinds of Outdoor Sports.

ONE TOUCH BUTTON OPERATION: One Button Recording with Audio,Simply to Turn on,Turn off and Capture Photo. Sunglases is with Vibration Alert with Audio when Recording Starts, Capturing Photos and Stops. A LED Indicator Light

PLAYING BACK VIDEO: Video Recording Camera Records for 60 Minutes around by Built In Safety Rechargeable Battery and Built In 32G Memory, You Can Playback the Content on a Computer or a TV by the Included USB Cabl
